about_the_game:
A classical Action RPG set in a sci-fi world. Battle evil robots, collect loot, upgrade your character. Wear pretty clothing for your feminine heroine, or put on powerful manly upgrades for your masculine hero.

Were you ever angry at an ARPG for forcing you to choose between an elegant feminine outfit or an ugly stronger item for your heroines? Suffer no longer! In my game, more powerful items are always prettier and more feminine.

What about your masculine hero? Men do not need pretty clothing, we want to look strong and powerful! And that is what you will get if you play as a masculine hero.

All the fluff is removed, what remains is the essence of what makes Action RPGs fun. I have played them all my life and I am here to make an ARPG that I would personally enjoy playing.


Welcome to Selfish Heroes!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains revealing female outfits. There is no other mature content otherwise.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Additional Notes: The game has a low-end graphical mode that is capable of running well on integrated GPUs at 1920x1080 resolution, delivering 60 frames per second.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia RTX 2060, AMD Radeon RX 5600XT
  • Additional Notes: The game looks best with hardware raytracing on the supported video cards.
